ph_link_url: Link must start with http or https (will be displayed after customer nickname)
ph_paste_upload: Copy and paste to upload image
tip_image_upload: Supports clicking blank area, drag & drop, paste to upload images. Image size must not exceed 2M. Only supports PNG, JPG, JPEG formats
ph_link_url_2: Link must start with http or https (will be displayed after customer nickname)
tip_mini_card: Mini program cards are only supported in Official Account, WeChat Customer Service and WeChat Mini Program. Other channels will fail to send. In Official Account reply, it must be an associated mini program. In WeChat Mini Program reply, it must be the current mini program
ph_mini_title: Please enter mini program card title
tip_mini_appid: Mini program top right three dots > Name > More Info > Appid; In Official Account reply, it must be associated with the mini program
tip_mini_path: Please contact mini program developer to get the path, e.g., /pages/index/index. Note, path is recommended to start with /
ph_paste_upload_2: Copy and paste to upload image
msg_link_protocol: Link must start with http or https
msg_insert_emoji: Try to insert emoji at cursor position, if not available, append to the end
msg_image_format: Only supports JPG, PNG format images
msg_paste_image: Copy image and press Ctrl+V to try pasting image
tip_follow_reply: Follow reply: First select robot, then fetch its smart menu
tip_default_no_select: By default, no smart menu is selected
msg_complete_image_text: Please complete required fields for image-text link
msg_complete_url: Please complete required fields for website URL
msg_complete_mini_card: Please complete required fields for mini program card
